mapper.select: SELECT notice_id, receiver_id, target_type, target_id, content, read_flag, created_at, del_flag FROM notice WHERE receiver_id = #{receiverId} AND del_flag IS NULL AND read_flag IS NULL ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (receiver_id, target_type, target_id, content, read_flag, created_at, del_flag) VALUES (#{receiverId}, #{targetType}, #{targetId}, #{content}, NULL, NOW(), NULL)
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET del_flag = NOW() WHERE receiver_id = #{receiverId} AND del_flag IS NULL
mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM notice WHERE receiver_id = #{receiverId} AND target_type = 'WATERING' AND target_id = #{targetId} AND created_at >= CURDATE() AND created_at < DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY)) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
